brand_identity.name: Paula Veiga
brand_identity.mission: To bring sweetness and elegance to every celebration through artisanal confectionery.

component_strategy.marketing_pages: Custom HTML + Tailwind. Use 'Section' containers with varied padding (py-24, py-32). Overlap elements using negative margins.
component_strategy.admin_dashboard: Strict Shadcn UI. Use Table, Form, Dialog, Sidebar components. Keep it clean and functional.

buttons.primary: bg-[#BE185D] hover:bg-[#9D174D] text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 transition-transform hover:scale-105 shadow-lg
buttons.secondary: border border-[#5D4037] text-[#5D4037] hover:bg-[#5D4037] hover:text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 transition-colors
buttons.floating_whatsapp: fixed bottom-8 right-8 bg-[#25D366] text-white p-4 rounded-full shadow-2xl hover:scale-110 transition-transform z-50 flex items-center gap-2

cards.product: bg-white rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 group border border-pink-100
cards.testimonial: bg-[#FFF5F5] p-8 rounded-xl border border-pink-200 relative

layout_patterns.grid_system: Use the 'Tetris Grid' for the Gallery. Mix col-span-1 (Standard Cakes) with col-span-2 row-span-2 (Wedding Cakes/Highlights).
layout_patterns.spacing: Generous. Minimum section spacing: py-24. Gap between grid items: gap-8.

sections: Hero: Full height, text parallax, emotional tagline 'Sweetness in Every Detail'. CTA: 'Order on WhatsApp'.
Featured: 3-Card display of best sellers with 'floating' hover effect.
About Teaser: Image left, Text right (or vice versa). Chef's photo mandatory.
Testimonials: Horizontal scroll or Grid of love notes.
Instagram Feed: A grid of 4-6 square images linked to @paula.veigacakes.

features: Filter Tabs: Wedding, Birthday, Special Occasions.
Masonry/Tetris Layout: Avoid boring equal squares.
Add/Edit: Form with Image Upload (mocked or real), Name, Price, Category, Description.

colors.text: Always use #4A3728 or #5D4037 for body text, never pure black.

motion.defaults: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} viewport={{ once: true }} transition={{ duration: 0.6 }}
motion.scroll: Use Lenis for smooth scrolling if possible.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure pink backgrounds are light enough (#FFF5F5) for brown text.
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup Tailwind Colors in tailwind.config.js immediately.
3. Use the provided image URLs. Do not leave placeholders.
4. Implement the Floating WhatsApp button on ALL marketing pages.
5. Ensure the Admin Panel is protected (mock auth is fine if backend not ready, but structure it properly).
6. Do not use 'Inter' font. Import Playfair Display and Manrope from Google Fonts.
